model_details.name: Risk Score GBM
model_details.intended_use: Predict driver risk score for auto insurance pricing
model_details.training_objective: Minimize MSE on risk score prediction

training_data.description: Synthetic telematics data with trip-level features
training_data.preprocessing: Feature aggregation from raw telemetry events

ethical_considerations.fairness: Model should not discriminate based on protected attributes
ethical_considerations.privacy: Uses pseudonymized driver IDs and aggregated features
ethical_considerations.explainability: SHAP values available for individual predictions
limitations: May not generalize to all driving conditions
Requires regular retraining with new data
